message: So, on this week's show we talked about my adventures with Greenpoison and our thoughts on jailbreaking. I think it is absolutely worth it and justified if the technology is being restricted artificially for political reasons. Discuss.
Have you tried any of the video out jailbreak apps? I know Laporte has used one to do an iPhone apps presentation. They have screen recorders too.
No, I haven't. I have thought about it. We could use the screen recording for tuts
